column5: Over the last while a few of my spinning reels have conked out.  I've used Aikmans (?) before down in Mississauga, but thats a long drive for me now.  Is there a place that does this work north of Toronto, for example Markham, Newmarket, Port Perry?   Thanks.
Angling Specialties, 3251 Kennedy Road. Unit 4 (south of Steeles) Scarborough. 416-609-0804 (I would call and ask first if they repair or have parts for the reels you need repaired.)

Well thats pretty much the top 3 !!!!....there the only ones i know,and they all are good,and have all the parts and tools,rockeys in orillia repaired a 30yr old reel for a freind i couldnt believe they found parts for it too....
